Class ModifyCustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.software2.Controllers.ModifyCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller used to modify the customer selected in the main page.
